definitions.definition: A disadvantage ; something that detracts or takes away .
examples: Poor fuel economy is a common drawback among larger vehicles.

definitions.definition: A partial refund of an import fee , as when goods are re-exported from the country that collected the fee.
The inhalation of a lungful of smoke from a cigarette , viewed as a skill of the practised smoker .

main_definition: A disadvantage ; something that detracts or takes away .
